title: Botters rule Dominion and Riot doesn't give a shit
body: I just played a Dominion match with my room mate... AND 8 FUCKING BOTS. In PvP. But there's no option to report cheaters/botters because Riot is delusional and think they're infallible (which anyone who's requested help from "Support" already knows). They're all named with randomly selected words (I took a screenshot but it didn't work because fuck Riot) and you can tell just by watching them play anyway.

replies.body:
Here somes:
Nat Tear
Eli Save
Ski Whip
Buy Pull
Far Some
Bin Robe
End Tide
But Sibg
Cow Fast
But Fire
Ron Mail
Bed Lute
Ham Wash
Run Much
Tag Goal
Tab Rose
Ben Even
Far face
Yes Door
Gym Help
                                Just go check a bot account and look at their recent game.
This kinda just looks like a Japanese band's album discography.
I hope S6 will bring an overhaul of alterative gamemodes

> [{quoted}](name=OperationDEEZ1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T18:30:05.546+0000)
>
> I hope S6 will bring an overhaul of alterative gamemodes

Does it affect LC$? No? Then Riot doesn't care
Unless of course Riot adds dominion as a professional game mode. do that and I promise about 3 times as many people would play dominion if only so they could have an easy shot at becoming a pro.
We can keep dreaming.

Whats really sad about this mode is that its kinda toxic to the overall game. Not only does it stay there being useless and thus doesn't allow a much better map/mode to replace it (URF anyone?) but it is a dirty easy way to earn really fast IP since with a snowballing champ, against bots, you can end the game in 13 minutes and get like 50-60 IP for it.
In fact I prefer them to keep ruining dominion (although it's sad), than coming to real 5v5 games and ruin everyone's experience.

> [{quoted}](name=ShinobuElveszett,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-07-30T00:47:30.517+0000)
>
> In fact I prefer them to keep ruining dominion (although it's sad), than coming to real 5v5 games and ruin everyone's experience.

I'd very much prefer it if Dominion was removed overall so that a new, much more popular map would take its place.

Other 5v5 pvp maps are heavily monitored from what I've seen, I've never encountered a bot in SR so I doubt bots will ever populate that. I always encounter them in Dominion though, and its not even two or one, its nine bots and me.
it takes so damn long to find a qeue though
3 minutes but in the long run it still gives more IP than SR games imo.

They only rule Dominion until you've played about 1000 games to get your elo up.
then there's only about 2-3 per game and queue time is roughly half a day.

Having a single bot per game is already a shame.

Imagine if all the ranked games you played had a random bot that basically decides the winner of the game.

> [{quoted}](name=ShinobuElveszett,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-07-30T00:45:40.723+0000)
>
> Having a single bot per game is already a shame.
> 
> Imagine if all the ranked games you played had a random bot that basically decides the winner of the game.

I was under the impression that this is how Ranked was already.
I don't play ranked. ;p

Don't :)
It's not worth it half the time >.>
This has been a problem for a couple of years now.  When Riot removed custom game XP the bot farmers flooded real games.
I think those bots are owned by a group that sells smurf accounts. They level up the smurfs for sale using that feature, which should not be allowed.

Their names are random. But its 3 letters then 4/ letters, like

Bat Ward
One Iron
Red Pack

No report bot/hacker option.
no one really plays dominion riot needs to add more and make it more attractive to play right now it is not very good i liked ascension better

Riot has said the report system is getting revamped soon since some categories feel redundant, and others don't feel like they don't cover enough.

So we should get some new report categories soon. Maybe one for bots!

Riot should give Dominion some love, though. Reminder to @ManWolfAxeBoss we are owed another discussion thread~

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-29T22:00:47.838+0000)
>
> Riot has said the report system is getting revamped soon since some categories feel redundant, and others don't feel like they don't cover enough.
> 
> So we should get some new report categories soon. Maybe one for bots!
> 
> Riot should give Dominion some love, though. Reminder to @ManWolfAxeBoss we are owed another discussion thread~

soon tm
rito in a nutshell countin monys.
Excuse my noobness, but what is a botter and how does it/they work?

Botters are just programs that play champions (ie. bots) with minimal AI to keep them from going afk every game and farm XP and IP in dominion to get level 30 accounts with lots of ip to sell to players as smurfs. 

the problem is they only have enough programing to move around in base usually and dont help you at all. Even worse is that  some have enough ai to run down lanes to try and cap points, but dont run away or defend themselves when they come under attack. 

They single handedly make Dominion unplayable because you can get into games where you are the ONLY player with 9 other brain dead Bots.

> [{quoted}](name=Kerchner12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:04:55.504+0000)
>
> Excuse my noobness, but what is a botter and how does it/they work?

It's an account where the game is literally played by a bot, similar to the ones in coop vs ai, except in this case, on dominion they always take ghost and heal, and then run at the bot lane, and usually by the end of the game have around 12 or more deaths.

> [{quoted}](name=jmaishere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2015-07-30T00:08:33.645+0000)
>
> It's an account where the game is literally played by a bot, similar to the ones in coop vs ai, except in this case, on dominion they always take ghost and heal, and then run at the bot lane, and usually by the end of the game have around 12 or more deaths.

how can riot not detect this?

> [{quoted}](name=Kerchner12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=000c00010000,timestamp=2015-08-01T01:55:10.167+0000)
>
> how can riot not detect this?

I'm pretty sure they can, as I think this used to happen a fair amount on TT, but they fixed that up
They are everywhere in TT. I'm just lvl23, but at this low elo is completely impossible to run TT without falling in a bot game. The absence of an accurate report option doesn't help.

People who play LoL have a misconception that this game was born from multiple game modes. The original dota was only ever played on a single map, same with it's predecessors. Riot has done more than any other MOBA by offering a second map for 3v3, as well as even coming up with Dominion, I understand the frustrations of Dominion players, but in the end it's like complaining about some cheesy DLC for a Steam game not being as humorous as you hoped.
Wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=octavian1127,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-07-30T02:33:29.426+0000)
>
> People who play LoL have a misconception that this game was born from multiple game modes. The original dota was only ever played on a single map, same with it's predecessors. Riot has done more than any other MOBA by offering a second map for 3v3, as well as even coming up with Dominion, I understand the frustrations of Dominion players, but in the end it's like complaining about some cheesy DLC for a Steam game not being as humorous as you hoped.

Contrary to your thoughts...The separate game modes with friends are far funner than any 'serious' game mode. Dominion use to be my favourite before bots flooded it and people didn't. ARAM with friends is aiiight.

As for other games...DotA does throw some other game modes out there, if not by Valve, then by the community (ala, Pudge Wars for instance). HoN has midwars and CTF. Both fun as hell for the most part, but better with friends because..well..randoms are meh normally.
I'm not saying the other modes aren't fun, just that in the end they will always be secondary to SR 5v5 because that's the game Riot is selling.

you do know you can just use one of the other report options right? or just send a support ticket and mention that you believe this are bots or something like that simple as that. You calling Riot delusional because of your own lazyness and incompetence is rather amusing

Have you even read the post?

RIOT basically ignores all the tickets you send, and I know this because I've sent support tickets three or four times with enough evidence for rather serious infractions, and all I've get is an automatic answer saying something like "we'll look into it but we can't tell you nothing because it's against our privacy policy" and then they've never done anything.

At this time when I a serious infraction I just ignore it. I won't lose my team sending a meaningless ticket that RIOT will blatantly ignore.

> [{quoted}](name=ShinobuElveszett,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-07-30T00:50:24.686+0000)
>
> Have you even read the post?
> 
> RIOT basically ignores all the tickets you send, and I know this because I've sent support tickets three or four times with enough evidence for rather serious infractions, and all I've get is an automatic answer saying something like "we'll look into it but we can't tell you nothing because it's against our privacy policy" and then they've never done anything.
> 
> At this time when I a serious infraction I just ignore it. I won't lose my team sending a meaningless ticket that RIOT will blatantly ignore.

that's your problem and not mine, if you don't want to send a ticket for whatever reason then don't. With that logic i guess i can just go making death threats in every game and not get punished since you know? they'll just ignore it
I have the sincere impression you just ignored what I wrote and replied a bunch of nonsense just to "win" the debate.
My thread has 40+ upvotes, you have currently -3. One of us is right, can you guess which?

> [{quoted}](name=Bauchelain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2015-07-30T08:14:08.663+0000)
>
> My thread has 40+ upvotes, you have currently -3. One of us is right, can you guess which?

oh noes! whatever shall i do! some douche that is too lazy and won't report something because "there's no botting option in the report section" and is calling others delusional because of his own lazyness has more upvotes than me! pls tell me whatever shall i do! MY LIFE IS RUINED!!!!!!!!!!

It's not about being too lazy to send in a ticket. The problem is that if Riot gives a shit, they're not showing it, which makes it look like they sure don't give a shit. In which case Riot would be that lazy douche you're being so sarcastic about.

> [{quoted}](name=Noble Absolution,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx84PkuA,comment-id=0009000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:03:13.144+0000)
>
> It's not about being too lazy to send in a ticket. The problem is that if Riot gives a shit, they're not showing it, which makes it look like they sure don't give a shit. In which case Riot would be that lazy douche you're being so sarcastic about.

Nailed it.
Dominion? What's that? Is it a board game or something?

This is an MMR issue that you are facing. Play more dominions, win against the bots, take the free ip, and you will eventually be placed against humans. This is what all my friends and I have had to do. The bots have really shit MMR so getting to the point where you never see them doesn't take too long to reach. I rarely see bots in my dominion games these days. But I did have to play a lot of games against them to reach this point.
And that's acceptable to you? Just deal with it? No. Just no.

I suppose the word acceptable is applicable. The bots can be hard to detect, but are obvious to humans who watch them. But frankly, there is not much that can be done about the bots due to how they fool riot's systems. So yea, take the free IP for a while and then you will be placed against more humans.
Well then Bauchelain, I am not sure why you are griping then, as that would of been a free win for your team. with 2 humans vs 5 bots.
Well then. Are you sure one of those bots wasn't me? I'm very bad at this game :P

Actually there are ways to report  bots and you're talking out your ass. A rioter has said before you should say "refusing to communicate with team" or just negative attitude and provide a description about how it's a bot.
Write down the names and send a support ticket.
It took me ~150 games to get my elo high enough to never get bots.
